text: Marcela Lobo Pérez (born 18 May 1984) is a Mexican equestrian. She competed in two events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Monterrey
title: Marcela Lobo Pérez
